categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starfighter classes

nodes.text: The Belbullab-24 strike bomber, also known as the CIS Strike Bomber, was a bomber variant of the Belbullab-22 starfighter that saw action during the Clone Wars and later. The fighter was equipped with proton bombs and laser cannons.

The Belbullab-24 were used by some of the Separatist holdouts, including Gizor Dellso's faction on Mustafar. While battling Dellso's forces over Mustafar, Darth Vader requested that an Imperial Pilot retrieve a Belbullab-24 and to deliver it to Imperial forces for closer inspection.
